title: Alimens & Gentle Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Stretch Stain Shield Long Sleeve Solid Business Wedding Button Down Shirts
description: Stain Shield: Our regular fit shirt suitable for a variety of Formal/Casual/ Business/Wedding/Party/Club/Dating, the mens dress shirts are made of 70% cotton material, Soft, skin friendly and breathable, special process makes the shirt waterproof, blocking stains still maintain good breathability.Waterproof and Stain resistant and keep you look pristine all day without worring the accident spills

Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Features: Classic solid color and no pocket design, modern traditional spread collar with the tips pointed outwards, allowing for tie knots of all sizes, dress on tie or without. Two adjustment button positions better fit on the wrist

Stretch & Versatile: The button down long sleeve shirt is made of stretch fabric,makes you move body easier; soft and comfortable with good breathability. The mens dress shirts stretch can be matched with dress pants, jacket, tie and a suit formalwear but also denim, chinos and more worn casually
Ideal Gift : The classic mens shirts long sleeve for men is a perfect gift for family, lovers and friends, staff, Father Day ,Valentine's day, Hallowmas，Christmas, New Year

Care Instructions: This men's dress shirts long sleeve can be machine or hand washed in cold/warm water and cannot be bleached. Please note that the stain resistance of the mens dress shirts decreases with the number of washes
